item.title: Sound Fixes Pack v25.21 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 5, 2025

Sound Fixes Pack v25.21 ATS

Changelogs v25.21
Reworked fallback/default wiper sounds.
Completed rework of interior rain sound in heavy rain conditions. üåßÔ∏è

v25.20
1 new sound variant for the leaf blower.
Western gull (Larus occidentalis) sounds now limited to mostly being heard at daytime. [ATS edition]
Added wet tire sound during rain for livestock trailers hauled by pickup trucks in AI traffic. [ATS edition] üåßÔ∏è
Added sound for rain hitting the roof on livestock trailers hauled by pickup trucks in AI traffic. [ATS edition]

Optional addon news
Previous soundproofing for ATS updated with revised soundproofing for the Kenworth W900.

Game version: 1.54-1.55.x

Credits: Drive Safely

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: ‚ÄúMy Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod‚Äù folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: ‚ÄúMy Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod‚Äù folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Real Economy Reloaded v1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 5, 2025

Real Economy Reloaded v1.54 ETS2

Changelog
Minor update of currencies from ECB site for May average.
Diesel prices updated (once per week) as of June.

Features:
‚Äì The prices of diesel, ferries and tolls are as IRL.
‚Äì Reworked loans and added insurance.
‚Äì Reworked traffic fines.
‚Äì Reworked experience, rewards and revenues.

There is ferry line Lixouri ‚Äì Argostolion which is a ‚Äúcomplete fantasy‚Äù as per SCS comment inside file so I didn‚Äôt change anything.

Credits: ExiaRS

item.title: MB 1620 v1.0 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 5, 2025

MB 1620 v1.0 1.54 ETS2

The Mercedes-Benz L 1620 is a true legend on Brazilian roads. It‚Äôs a semi-heavy truck that earned its iconic status through its robustness, reliability, simple mechanics, and excellent cost-benefit ratio. Even though its production officially ended in 2011, it remains incredibly popular in the used truck market and is a common sight across Brazil.

Here‚Äôs a breakdown of what makes the MB 1620 so well-known:
Key Features and Design:
Robust Construction: The 1620 was built to withstand the challenging conditions of Brazilian roads. Its chassis and components are known for their durability.
Simple Mechanics: A major selling point was its straightforward mechanical system. This made it easier to maintain and repair, even in remote locations, contributing to lower operating costs and a preference among independent truck drivers.
Versatility: The 1620 was widely used for various applications, including:
Carroceria aberta (flatbed/stake bed): For general cargo.
Ba√∫ (dry van): For protected cargo.
Ca√ßamba (dump truck): For construction and agricultural materials.
Tanque (tanker): For liquids.
Guincho (tow truck): For vehicle recovery.
It was available in different axle configurations, most commonly as a truck (6√ó2) with a third axle, but also as a toco (4√ó2).
Driver‚Äôs Cab: While not as luxurious as modern trucks, the 1620‚Äôs cabin was practical and functional for its time, providing a good working environment for drivers.

Engine and Performance:
Mercedes-Benz OM 366 LA Engine: This was the heart of the 1620‚Äôs success. It‚Äôs a 6-cylinder in-line turbocooler diesel engine. Over its production run, there were variations in power output to meet evolving emissions standards (Proconve).
Earlier versions might have around 204 hp (as in the OM 366 A turbo, for example).
Later versions, especially the ‚ÄúEletr√¥nico‚Äù (Electronic) models, featured the OM 906 LA engine, offering around 211 hp and 71 kgfm of torque (in the Classic version) or 231 hp and 83 kgfm of torque (in the Eletr√¥nico version).
The ‚Äúbomba grande‚Äù (large pump) versions refer to the mechanical injection pump, highly valued for its simplicity and robustness.
Transmission: Typically equipped with manual transmissions, like the Mercedes-Benz G 85-6, which offered good gear ratios for various loads and terrains.
Fuel Economy: For its class and era, the 1620 was considered to have reasonable fuel consumption, which further contributed to its popularity.

Credits: junior

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it‚Äôs easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: ‚ÄúMy Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod‚Äù folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: ‚ÄúMy Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod‚Äù folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
